summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Sunday 16 January to end of Monday 17 January GMT
description: The rest of the weekend is set to be cloudy with a possibility of rain on Sunday, cold but sunshine on Monday.<br/><br/>Incoming air, while initially from Europe, is expected to become more westerly as influenced by an area of high pressure moving eastwards across the continent. Therefore bringing little by way of pollution import.<br/><br/>With winds picking up over the weekend, dispersion of locally emitted pollution should improve when compared with recent days. <br/><br/>Overall, air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/><br/><br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
